backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI, playfield, and gameplay-bound changes with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and recent styling/gameplay adjustments.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for theming, dark mode, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying safe‑area padding and wrapping GameScreen with an orientation guard.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion renderer providing hit, player, and bomb variants with size‑scaled flashes, waves, and embers.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Compact bullet graphic with rotation, glow, core gradient, and trailing effect.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Renders a scalable hexagon obstacle with boss-specific colors, glow effects, and size-based styling.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Displays the player jet with rotation, SVG body, and animated thruster effects when thrusting.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game loop managing entities, physics, spawning, scoring, levels, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides clamping, boundary reflection, and out-of-bounds checks using percent-based positions.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Handles elastic circular obstacle collisions with separation, damping, and percent-to-pixel conversions.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines if a player–obstacle collision is a full hit based on overlap depth and radius thresholds.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Includes vector utilities for angle conversion, pixel-to-percent velocity scaling, and directional offsets.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Playfield container with flush borders, corner accents, and a grid overlay wrapping all game entities.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Renders the game's HUD, boss bar, start screen, pause controls, and mobile joystick/shoot UI.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Detects device orientation, attempts landscape lock, and shows a rotate prompt when in portrait.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: Button component handling pointer events to trigger firing start and end actions.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Touch joystick that computes movement vectors and resets on pointer release or external reset token.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides level-based duration calculation and utility to format seconds into readable time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom game-themed colors, shadows, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors with game variables and enabling plugins and utilities.
project_state.json: Describes the current state of a web game project, including UI gap/compactness issues and pending PWA support, along with existing and new feature requests.
